doc:
Mark Strong https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Strong 0 Mark Strong (born Marco Giuseppe Salussolia; 5 August 1963) is an English actor. He is known for his roles in films such as Stardust, RocknRolla, Body of Lies, Sherlock Holmes, Kick-Ass, Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy, Zero Dark Thirty, The Imitation Game, Kingsman: The Secret Service and its sequel Kingsman: The Golden Circle. Mark_Strong ( born Marco_Giuseppe_Salussolia ; 5_August_1963 ) is an_English_actor . He is_known for his_roles in films such_as Stardust , RocknRolla , Body of Lies , Sherlock_Holmes , Kick-Ass , Tinker_Tailor_Soldier_Spy , Zero_Dark_Thirty , The_Imitation_Game , Kingsman : The_Secret_Service and its_sequel_Kingsman : The_Golden_Circle .
